index.introduction.title: Welcome
index.introduction.text:
Hello, I am Guilherme.

I started at the development career accidentally. Before being a programmer I was just a kid who could not get away from his computer: the Microsoft Paint designer and Windows Movie Maker editor.

Today I am a graduated computer scientist, specialized in great user experience building - in other words, I am a front-end developer.
index.now_playing.title: Now Playing

I love listening to music!

index.skills.title: I am a Web Developer
index.skills.text:
I love to code!

I am a JavaScript specialist, used to its singularities.

I've already been in touch with several frameworks and libs, and the deep understanding of the language makes the learning of new APIs way easier.
index.skills.button: Take a look at my GitHub

I take some time to write about tech.
